scenes.description: Opening animation for the Hololive English -Advent- 3D Collaboration, introducing the members: Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Nerissa Ravencroft, Fuwawa Abyssgard, and Mococo Abyssgard.
The members of Advent perform their debut group song, 'Rebellion', on a 3D stage.
